mapper.select:
select x.bdcqzh,x.zl,x.qlr,x.qlrzjh,x.qszt,x.bdcdyh,x.yxtcqzh,x.ywr,x.ywrzjh from bdc_xm x where 1=1
and x.xmid in
#{item}
and 1=2
order by X.djsj desc

select x.xmid,x.bdcqzh,x.zl,x.qlr,x.qlrzjh,x.qszt,x.bdcdyh,x.ywr,x.ywrzjh, x.djyy,x.DJJG,x.DJSJ,x.DBR from bdc_xm x inner join bdc_dyaq dy on x.xmid = dy.xmid where (x.qllx = 95 or x.qllx=37) and x.qszt != 2
AND x.qlr like '%' || #{qlrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND x.qlrzjh like '%' || #{qlrzjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND x.bdcqzh like '%' || #{bdcqzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND x.zl like '%' || #{zl} || '%'
AND x.ywr like '%' || #{ywr} || '%'
AND x.ywrzjh like '%' || #{ywrzjh} || '%'
AND x.bdcdyh like '%' || #{bdcdyh} || '%'
AND x.slbh like '%' || #{slbh} || '%'
order by X.djsj desc

choose.when: SELECT x.bdcqzh FROM bdc_xm x LEFT JOIN bdc_xm_lsgx gx ON x.xmid = gx.yxmid WHERE gx.xmid= #{xmid}
choose.otherwise: SELECT bdcqzh FROM ( SELECT bdcqzh FROM bdc_xm xm WHERE qllx in (4,6,8) AND xm.bdcdyh = #{bdcdyh} and xm.bdcqzh is not null ORDER BY xm.slsj desc nulls last ) where rownum = 1
